text: Manase naga'mo'za Efraemi nagara zamahe'za nesageno, Efraemi naga'mo'za Manase nagara zamahe'za negahaze. Anama huteke eri mago'ma hana'ana, Juda nagamokizmia hahu zamantegaha'e. Anumzamo'a ama anazana atrenigeno zamagritera egahianagi, Agri rimpa ahe'zamo'a vaga oresanigeno, azana erisga huno rusuteteno manigahie.
